name: Hermes’ Trickery
printed_effect:
This Hermes' Trickery can only be played if
Hermes is Enchanted. Destroy an Elestral on
your field. If you do, Special Cast another Elestral
from your Underworld using only Spirits that
were Enchanting the destroyed Elestral.
effect: This Hermes' Trickery can only be played if Hermes is Enchanted. Destroy an Elestral on your field. If you do, Special Cast another Elestral from your Underworld using only Enchanting Spirits on the destroyed Elestral.
